checkPersonID: select count(UserID) from  MagniFoodSchema.Person where UserID Like'%{0}%';
checkCustomer: select count(UserID) from  MagniFoodSchema.Customer where CustomerID Like'%{0}%';
checkCustomerPassword: select count(CustomerID) from  MagniFoodSchema.Customer where CustomerID Like'%{0}%' AND CustomerPassword Like '%{1}%' AND CustomerStatus Like '%{2}%';
checkCafeteriaManager: select count(CafeteriaManagerID) from  MagniFoodSchema.CafeteriaManager where CafeteriaManagerID Like'%{0}%';
checkCafeteriaManagerVendorID: select count(CafeteriaManagerID) from  MagniFoodSchema.CafeteriaManager where CafeteriaVendorID Like'%{0}%';
checkCafeteriaManagerPassword: select count(CafeteriaManagerID) from  MagniFoodSchema.CafeteriaManager where CafeteriaManagerID Like'%{0}%' AND CafeteriaManagerPassword Like '%{1}%' AND CafeteriaManagerrStatus Like '%{2}%';
checkCafeteria: select count(CafeteriaVendorID) from MagniFoodSchema.CafeteriaVendor where CafeteriaVendorID Like'%{0}%' and CafeteriaVendorStatus like '%{1}%';
checkCafe: select count(CafeID) from MagniFoodSchema.Cafe where CafeID Like'%{0}%' and CafeStatus like '%{1}%';
checkCafeUserPassword: select count(CafeUserID) from  MagniFoodSchema.CafeUser where CafeUserID Like'%{0}%' AND CafeUserPassword Like '%{1}%' AND CafeUserStatus Like '%{2}%';
checkCafeUser: select count(CafeUserID) from  MagniFoodSchema.CafeUser where CafeUserID Like'%{0}%';
checkStoreHouseInventoryItem: select count(IngredientID) from MagniFoodSchema.StoreHouseInventory where IngredientID Like '%{0}%';
updateStoreHouseInventory: Update MagniFoodSchema.StoreHouseInventory SET IngredientID= '{0}',IngredientName= '{1}',IngredientQuantity='{2}',IngredientQuantityUnit='{3}',IngredientStatus= '{4}' where IngredientID = '{5}';
updateCafe: Update MagniFoodSchema.Cafe SET CafeID='{4}',CafeName= '{1}',CafeStatus='{2}',CafeteriaVendorID='{3}' where CafeID like '%{0}%';
allcafes: select * from  MagniFoodSchema.Cafe where CafeStatus Like'%{0}%';
allorders: select c.CafeID,o.CustomerOrderID,o.CustomerOrderStatus  from  MagniFoodSchema.CustomerOrderFoodList x, MagniFoodSchema.FoodItem f,CustomerOrder o,MagniFoodSchema.CafeMenu m, MagniFoodSchema.Cafe c where x.FoodItemID = f.FoodItemID and f.CAFEMENUID = m.CAFEMENUID and m.CafeID=c.CafeID
cafeAllCustomerOrdersFromCafe: select c.CafeID as CafeID,o.CustomerOrderID as CustomerOrderID,o.CustomerOrderStatus as CustomerOrderStatus, x.FoodItemID as FoodItemID from  MagniFoodSchema.CustomerOrderFoodList x, MagniFoodSchema.FoodItem f,CustomerOrder o,MagniFoodSchema.CafeMenu m, MagniFoodSchema.Cafe c where x.FoodItemID = f.FoodItemID and f.CAFEMENUID = m.CAFEMENUID and m.CafeID=c.CafeID and c.CafeID Like'%{0}%';
cafeAllCustomerOrders: select c.CafeID as CafeID,o.CustomerOrderID as CustomerOrderID,o.CustomerOrderStatus as CustomerOrderStatus, x.FoodItemID as FoodItemID from  MagniFoodSchema.CustomerOrderFoodList x, MagniFoodSchema.FoodItem f,CustomerOrder o,MagniFoodSchema.CafeMenu m, MagniFoodSchema.Cafe c where x.FoodItemID = f.FoodItemID and f.CAFEMENUID = m.CAFEMENUID and m.CafeID=c.CafeID;
cafeFoodItems: select f.FoodItemName from FoodItem f,CafeMenu m, cafe c where f.CafeMenuID = m.CafeMenuID and m.CafeID=c.CafeID and f.FoodItemStatus='available' and c.CafeStatus='active' and c.CafeID like'%{0}%';
countOfCafeFoodItem: select count(*) from FoodItem f,CafeMenu m, cafe c where f.CafeMenuID = m.CafeMenuID and m.CafeID=c.CafeID and c.CafeID like'%{0}%';
foodItemIngredient: select r.FoodItemIngredientQuantity,s.IngredientQuantity, s.IngredientStatus, f.FoodItemStatus from  FoodItemRecipe r, FoodItem f, StoreHouseInventory s where s.IngredientID=r.IngredientID and r.FoodItemID=f.FoodItemID and f.FoodItemName like '%{0}%';
marFoodItemNA: Update MagniFoodSchema.FoodItem SET FoodItemStatus='not_available' where IngredientID = (select f.FoodItemID from FoodItem f,FoodItemRecipe r, StoreHouseInventory s where f.FoodItemID=r.FoodItemID and r.IngredientID=s.IngredientID and s.IngredientStatus='not_available' );
updateFoodItem: Update MagniFoodSchema.FoodItem SET FoodItemID= '{0}',FoodItemName= '{1}',FoodItemType='{2}',FoodItemDescription='{3}',FoodItemCost= {4},FoodItemStatus = '{5}',CafeMenuID='{6}' where CafeMenuID like '%{6}%' and FoodItemID like '%{0}%';
updateRecipe: Update MagniFoodSchema.FoodItemRecipe SET FoodItemIngredientQuantity={0} where FoodItemID Like '%{1}%';
cafeMenueItems: select f.FoodItemName from  MagniFoodSchema.FoodItem f,MagniFoodSchema.CafeMenu m, MagniFoodSchema.Cafe c  where f.CAFEMENUID=m.CAFEMENUID and m.CAFEID=c.CAFEID and c.CafeID='{0}' AND f.FoodItemStatus='available';
updateOrderStatus: Update MagniFoodSchema.CustomerOrder SET CustomerOrderStatus= '{1}' where CustomerOrderID like '%{0}%';
inventoryCheck: select IngredientID, IngredientQuantity , totalIngredientQuantityRequired from storehouseinventory right outer join (select sum(FoodItemIngredientQuantity) as totalIngredientQuantityRequired, IngredientID as IngredientID_2 from (select r.FoodItemIngredientQuantity as FoodItemIngredientQuantity ,r.IngredientID as IngredientID, f.FoodItemStatus as ada from  FoodItem f, FoodItemRecipe r, CustomerOrderFoodList o, CustomerOrder c where r.FoodItemID = o.FoodItemID and o.CustomerOrderID = c.CustomerOrderID and f.FoodItemID=o.FoodItemID and o.CustomerOrderID= '{0}') group by IngredientID ) on storehouseinventory.IngredientID = IngredientID_2;
foodDetails: select FoodItemID,fooditemname,fooditemcost,fooditemstatus from FoodItem where fooditemname like '%{0}%';
